Translations.Text: Tamen ceng meng yindao, guchang shuo youmei de yuyan; tamen ceng meng yindao, gu zunxun shou zansong zhe de dadao

Bu xindao erqie fang'ai zhu dao, bingqie fang'ai wo shi zhongren ──dingju de he youmu de ──gongtong zunjing jin si zhe,(wo jiang shi ta shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa); shei yin bu yi er yu zai jin sizhong weibei zhengdao, wo jiang shi shei shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa
Dangshi wo ceng wei yi bo la xin zhiding tian fang di dizhi,(wo shuo):“Ni buyao yi renhe wu pei wo, ni yingdang wei huanxing zhe, lizheng zhe, jugong zhe he koutou zhe, dasao wo de fangwu
Ni yingdang zai zhongren zhong xuangao chaojin, tamen jiu cong yuandao huo tubu huo chengzhe shou tuo, dao ni zheli lai

yibian tamen jianzheng tamen suoyou de xuduo liyi, bingqie zai guiding de ruogan rinei, jinian zhenzhu zhi ming er tuzai ta ci gei tamen de shengchu.” Nimen keyi chi naxie shengchu de rou, bingqie yingdang yong lai kuandai kunku de he pinqiong de ren
Ranhou jiao tamen dichu tamen de wugou, jiao tamen luxing tamen de shiyuan, jiao tamen weirao na jian gu fang er huanxing

Shiqing jiushi zheyang de, shei zunzhong zhenzhu de jielu, zai zhu di nali duiyu shei shi geng hao de. Yiqie shengchu dui nimen dou shi hefa de, dui nimen yi xuanbu jin jie zhe chuwai. Gu nimen yingdang bi kai wuhui ji ouxiang, yingdang yuanli wangyu
